articles.title: Market Movers: Lupin shares in delicate condition on margin squeeze - Economic Times
articles.description: Lupin's EBITDA margins contracted by 580 bps quarter-on-quarter (QoQ) and 1,050 bps YoY at 9.9 per cent even as profit rose 24 per cent YoY
articles.content:
All is not well for pharma major Lupin and that is visible in the company's share performance.

articles.title: Jio offers two days of free calls and data to users, check if you are eligible - India Today
articles.description: Reliance Jio is offering two days of unlimited complimentary services to its users, but there is a catch around this new offering and it involves the network disruption of last week.
